body.name: Water Bottle Handle, Silicone Water Bottle Sling, Carrier, Holder with Strap, Fits Most 8-40oz Bottles Stanley Cup Accessories
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 3 hrs 47 mins
features: 【Convenient Carrying】 This water bottle handle strap is designed to make carrying your water bottle effortless. Whether you’re hiking, biking, or simply on the go, the handle strap provides a secure and comfortable grip.

【Soft Silicone Material】 Made from high-quality and durable silicone material, the handle strap is soft to the touch and gentle on your hands. It adds an extra layer of comfort while carrying your water bottle.

【Versatile Compatibility】 The handle strap is designed to fit most water bottles ranging from 8oz to 40oz. Whether you have a small and compact bottle or a larger one, this strap will securely hold it in place.
【Easy to Install】 The handle strap features a simple and user-friendly design for easy installation. Just wrap it around the bottle and secure it in place, and you’re ready to go.

【Stylish and Functional Design】 This cutie handle strap not only adds functionality to your sports water bottle but also looks great. Its sleek and stylish design complements any bottle, making it the ideal accessory for your daily hydration routine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little silicone carrying strap
reviews.reviewText: I really like the feel of this silicone bottle strap. It isn't inexpensive; but it does keep me from so easily forgetting my water bottle, so it saves me having to buy a new one! LOL It is truly convenient, adds a little fun style & color, and makes the bottle more easily identifiable. It's great for taking my quality metal bottle on hikes, long walks and day trips with added convenience. Additionally, the detachable hook means that I can easily attach the bottle to my backpack, purse, stroller, etc. I'm pleased with this silicone strap in both appearance, comfort, and versatility.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It’s ok, fits simple modern 40oz tumbler
reviews.reviewText: Installation was easy, just stretch it like a rubber band over the top and past the lid, then clip the handle onto the band. It fits my Simple Modern 40 oz Trek Tumbler perfectly. The handle strap is thick and comfortable to hold. My main concern is that even when only 2/3 full of ice and water, the band shifts up a little under the weight of the bottle. In person it’s easy to see the stress point on the rubber band by the clasps. Also, the claps themselves are quite thin, I have thicker clasps on keychains which don’t have to support as much weight. Overall, it works for now, but I don’t feel confident that this will last long for me. I recommend it if you don’t keep your water bottle too full or packed with ice.
